Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially black in section, the interior is partly covered with a grey-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393231) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393231)
